awscc_budgets_budgets_action (Data Source)

Data Source schema for AWS::Budgets::BudgetsAction

Schema

Required

  • id (String) Uniquely identifies the resource.

Read-Only

  • action_id (String)
  • action_threshold (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • action_type (String)
  • approval_model (String)
  • budget_name (String)
  • definition (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • execution_role_arn (String)
  • notification_type (String)
  • resource_tags (Attributes List) (see below for nested schema)
  • subscribers (Attributes List) (see below for nested schema)

Nested Schema for action_threshold

Read-Only:

  • type (String)
  • value (Number)

Nested Schema for definition

Read-Only:

  • iam_action_definition (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • scp_action_definition (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • ssm_action_definition (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)

Nested Schema for definition.iam_action_definition

Read-Only:

  • groups (List of String)
  • policy_arn (String)
  • roles (List of String)
  • users (List of String)

Nested Schema for definition.scp_action_definition

Read-Only:

  • policy_id (String)
  • target_ids (List of String)

Nested Schema for definition.ssm_action_definition

Read-Only:

  • instance_ids (List of String)
  • region (String)
  • subtype (String)

Nested Schema for resource_tags

Read-Only:

  • key (String)
  • value (String)

Nested Schema for subscribers

Read-Only:

  • address (String)
  • type (String)
